EmailTemplate.name: CR 5.1 Non-Attendance to Assessment
EmailTemplate.subject: Your assessment for the NCS programme
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your staffing representative on {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}. Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
According to our records you were registered onto a group assessment with us on [HR EVENT DATE] but you did not attend.
What should I do next?
Please contact me using the details listed at the bottom of this email if you:
(a) Would like to be considered or a seasion role on the NCS programme. You will be able to discuss your reasons for not attending and your options for another assessment date.
(b) Feel that your attendance status is wrong.
I can no longer continue with my application
If you can no longer attend an assessment or commit to any work schedules for this year please contact me so I can update your profile.
Please quote the email reference number below in any correspondence and check out our FAQs for further information.
Kind regards The Challenge
NCS Programme
{!Contact.OwnerFullName}
{!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}
